thread.title: Apple plans giant high-end iPhone, lower-priced model: Bloomberg

title: Apple plans giant high-end iPhone, lower-priced model: Bloomberg
text: February 26, 2018 / 5:57 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago Apple plans giant high-end iPhone, lower-priced model: Bloomberg Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Reuters) - Apple Inc ( AAPL.O ) is preparing to release three new smartphones later this year, Bloomberg reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the products. The trio will include the largest ever iPhone, an upgraded handset the same size as the current iPhone X and a less expensive model with some of the flagship phoneâ€™s key features. The iPhone maker is already running production tests with suppliers and is expected to announce the new phones this fall. However, the plans could still change, the report said. ( bloom.bg/2HNO4wg ) Apple did not immediately respond to a request for comment. Reporting by Sonam Rai in Bengaluru; Editing by Saumyadeb Chakrabarty
